channel.title: Need help whit emote while using an object

item.title: Need help whit emote while using an object
item.dc:creator: @gon3d34d123 gon3d34d123
item.description:
@gon3d34d123 wrote:

if(objectID == 2287 && System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > actionInterval && absX == 2899 && absY == 2705){
if(playerLevel[16] >= 0){
pEmote = 749;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
WalkTimer(0, -4);
addSkillXP(250, 16);
actionInterval = 3000;
lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
} else
sM("Wth noob, how did you get 0 agility?");
}

How would I generate that to do the emote while he walks/runs through the, in this case, Obstacle Pipe?
Right now he’s just running through the obstacle, and when he’s done the Emote command executes…
Can annyone tell me how to modify or modify the code so it works correct?

Thanx

Linus
